Compares the wrapped pointers of two {{tt|propagate_const}}s, or between a {{tt|propagate_const}} and {{c|nullptr}}, or between a {{tt|propagate_const}} and another object.

@1-4@ Equality comparison for a {{tt|propagate_const}} and {{c|nullptr}}.

@5,6@ Equality comparison for two {{tt|propagate_const}}s.

@7-10@ Ordered comparison for two {{tt|propagate_const}}s.

@11-14@ Equality comparison for a {{tt|propagate_const}} and another object.

@15-22@ Ordered comparison for a {{tt|propagate_const}} and another object.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|pt, pu|{{tt|propagate_const}}s to compare}}
{{par|t, u|other objects to compare}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
Let {{tt|t_}} denote the underlying pointer-like object wrapped by a {{tt|propagate_const}}.

@1@ {{c|pt.t_ {{==}} nullptr}}
@2@ {{c|nullptr {{==}} pt.t_}}
@3@ {{c|pt.t_ !{{=}} nullptr}}
@4@ {{c|nullptr !{{=}} pt.t_}}
@5@ {{c|1=pt.t_ == pu.t_}}
@6@ {{c|1=pt.t_ != pu.t_}}
@7@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &lt; pu.t_}}
@8@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &gt; pu.t_}}
@9@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &lt;= pu.t_}}
@10@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &gt;= pu.t_}}
@11@ {{c|1=pt.t_ == u}}
@12@ {{c|1=pt.t_ != u}}
@13@ {{c|1=t == pu.t_}}
@14@ {{c|1=t != pu.t_}}
@15@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &lt; u}}
@16@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &gt; u}}
@17@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &lt;= u}}
@18@ {{c|1=pt.t_ &gt;= u}}
@19@ {{c|1=t &lt; pu.t_}}
@20@ {{c|1=t &gt; pu.t_}}
@21@ {{c|1=t &lt;= pu.t_}}
@22@ {{c|1=t &gt;= pu.t_}}
